webpage.datasets:
ds1 1 4
select * from (select t.id,t.name,t.cover,vci.if_shelves,nvl(vci.serial_number,10000000000)as serial_number ,nvl(t.watch_count,0)as WATCH_COUNT,vci.if_login,vci.if_del,vci.up_time from v_vms_video_countprop t ,vms_cast_info vci where t.id = vci.id and vci.service_type='110000' and vci.if_shelves='1' and vci.if_del='1' order by serial_number asc,watch_count desc,vci.up_time desc) where rownum<11
ds2 1 4
select * from (select t.id,t.name,t.cover,vci.if_shelves,nvl(vci.serial_number,10000000000)as serial_number ,nvl(t.watch_count,0)as WATCH_COUNT,vci.if_login,vci.if_del,vci.up_time from v_vms_video_countprop t ,vms_cast_info vci where t.id = vci.id and vci.service_type='120000' and vci.if_shelves='1' and vci.if_del='1' order by serial_number asc,watch_count desc,vci.up_time desc) where rownum<11
ds3 1 4
